item.title: SubC under development
item.description: Working on a new Decent Sampler synth bass preset 🎹 🎛️
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: The sample libraries just reached 10,000 downloads
item.description: The sample libraries by Dehli Musikk on Pianobook have now been downloaded over ten thousand times 😃
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Finished building the bus compressor
item.description: Finished building and hooking up the G Bus VCA Compressor from DIY Recording Equipment🕺 Here together with the previous build project, Hairball Audio FET/RACK 😃
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Building a bus compressor
item.description: Building a clone of a SSL G384 bus compressor from DIY Recording Equipment 🎛️🛠️
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Voltage Controlled Cassette Organ under development
item.description: Working on a new Decent Sampler preset 🎹 🎛️
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New synth - Suzuki Omnichord OM-84 System Two
item.description: Just got this beauty 🤩 Suzuki Omnichord OM-84 🎛️ Thanks a lot to Charlie at Riffers for amazing service 👍 UPS managed to break the first one in transit, even though it was securely packed, but Charlie got me a new one 😃
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Wurlitzer Music neon sign
item.description: Got this beautiful Wurlitzer neon sign from Ruth 66 today 😃 The photos doesn't really do it justice. It looks a lot more vibrant in person 🤩
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Finished build project - Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D
item.description: The final result of the compressor build 🛠️⚡🎛️
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New build project - Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D
item.description: Building a FET/RACK (1176) compressor from Hairball Audio 🛠️⚡🎛️
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New mixer - Roland PA-120
item.description: The Mean Green Machine 💚🎚️🎛️ Roland PA-120 with built-in spring reverb and effects loop for tape echo 😁
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - No Man Isle by Haunted By Silhouettes
item.description: Kick start the weekend with the brand new EP No Man Isle by Haunted By Silhouettes 💥 I have had a lot of fun recording keyboards, sound effects and accordion on this 🤠🤘 Have a nice weekend!
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Make fuzz not war
item.description: Thank you so much, Angus at ABL Pedals for building this amazing Ukrainian Muff pedal and donating the proceeds to the DEC Ukraine Humanitarian Appeal 💙💛🇺🇦 Слава Украине!✊
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Selkie by Haunted By Silhouettes
item.description: Haunted By Silhouettes is out with a new song featuring Björn Strid from i.a. Soilwork and The Night Flight Orchestra. The song is from the upcoming EP No Man Isle which I've had the honor of participating on.
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Flock by Haunted By Silhouettes
item.description: I have been so lucky to play keyboards on the upcoming EP No Man Isle by Haunted By Silhouettes 😃 Today they've released the first song Flock and it sounds insanely good 🤠🤘
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Fired Up by Kaasin
item.description: The album Fired Up by Kaasin is now released 🎉 Available on all streaming services and as a CD 💿
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: An oddball is featured in "Varden" and "NRK Vestfold og Telemark" today
item.description: This is the living room of Benjamin (32): - "Everything" of salaries since junior high has been spent 💸 Photo by: Andreas Soltvedt 📷
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Wrong by Kaasin
item.description: The new song Wrong by Kaasin has been released. Wrong will also be featured on the upcoming album Fired Up.
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New effects unit - Ace Tone FM-2 Fuzz Master Professional
item.description: Got a new fuzz pedal today 😃 FM-2 Fuzz Master Professional by Ace 🔊Tone
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Music video - We Are One by Kaasin
item.description: New song by Kaasin with music video shot at Systemblokk in Bø 🧱 The music video is made by Jon Sandersen 🎥
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Coming soon - Fired Up by Kaasin
item.description: The debut album Fired Up by Kaasin will be released November 10th, 2021 🔥🎶🎵💿
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli
